marklogic.body: I have to agree with Williams on this. Shaprton and Jackson and can't forget Obama... they are all three of the biggest racists in the world. They can't get past what happened generations ago and they aim to never let the world forget it. Those three (and I know there are plenty of others also) need not stir the racial pot. They keep those embers Burning..... and when this explodes, they will be there, spewing nonsense. What they SHOULD be doing is trying to shorten the gap between all races and they are doing just the opposite. Dr. A King, niece of MLK, said Sharpton and Jackson are playing that race-card at every opportunity and it must stop. Without those three on the violence, there would not be the national attention that this unfortunate situation has Gained. I am sorry a young man lost his life... however, both families are hurting due to this.... not just the Martins.
